abstract: Even if analysts could somehow reconcile all the numbers gushing from the nation’s banks each quarter, they would still be significantly in the dark.
snippet: Even if analysts could somehow reconcile all the numbers gushing from the nation’s banks each quarter, they would still be significantly in the dark.
lead_paragraph: Some people stay sharp in their old age by doing crossword puzzles. Some play memory games or Scrabble or cut back on the heavy drinking.

headline.main: Tackling Reams of Bank Data Can Take Diligence, and Trust
